idea: We aim to simplify the buying of daily essentials with trust for the middle-class urban households in India. So, we are on a mission to bring the convenience of e-commerce with the trust of a local Kirana Store. We want to simplify the process of acquiring daily essentials even more for our consumers. We plan to do this by onboarding a co-ordinator from each society, a woman who lives in the society or nearby areas (by this we are also creating women micro-entrepreneurs, and giving them an opportunity to earn extra income). She becomes the one-point contact of all the consumers of the society, giving them the much-needed trust and comfort of a one-point human contact
name: LA CESTA VENTURES PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
OrderStack is an offshore product development organization that designs and develops software applications, offering services spanning the entire software development life cycle. Headquartered in Mumbai.


OrderStack has grown organically without any external investment. The growth is attributed to very strong philosophies around writing clean code, designing intuitive user experiences, and letting the work speak for itself. Uniquely, OrderStack does not have a sales team but happy clients referring new clients.
name: OrderStack

idea: A Futuristic organization founded by young & passionate entrepreneurs who believe in developing innovative and Nature friendly products. The aim is to provide solutions in the Area of brand identity.

idea:
We at SEA ESPORT aspire to create an Esport application that will primarily orbit around an online battle royale game GARENA FREE FIRE.


FREE FIRE is currently the most viewed game on youtube in INDIA


Daily Active users = 6-7M users in INDIA


User base = 40 million+ in INDIA 


Global stats: 100 million users weekly

                       

                        500 million  users 


FREE FIRE is racing to 1B downloads on play store.


GAME OVERVIEW:

1. TPP [Third Person Perspective] Battle Royale Game

2. Contains In App Purchases

3. Game currency "DIAMONDS"


70% of FREE FIRE users in INDIA range in the age band of 9-18 years of age, which makes it tough for them to buy diamonds because of shortage of money. [THE DEMAND FOR DIAMONDS IS IMMENSE]


We at SEA ESPORT have a tentative framework to solve this problem with our app. The app intends to provide DIAMONDS for FREE.


Our app will consist DIAMONDS  as its currency and the users will get those diamonds by performing various tasks in the app [example : app downloads, viewing ads, playing games, refer and earn]


Our app is a sure shot success because no competitor is providing directly DIAMONDS as their currency.


Our app users can redeem their diamonds directly in the game [again ! no app is doing it]


We request a fund raising round for this idea where we can explain you the revenue generating model comprehensively. 


THANK YOU
name: SEA ESPORT

idea: Our goal as a LLP company is to empower our local farmers and manufacturers by providing them an access to the global market place, and contribute in the growth of our nation.
name: Shreeniwas Exports & Traders LLP
